briefdescription.para: constructs an empty kinetic space partition object.

detaileddescription.para: Use insert() afterwards to insert polygons into the partition and initialize() to initialize the partition.

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: Write timing and internal information to std::cout.

briefdescription.para: constructs a kinetic space partition object and initializes it.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ConstRange whose iterator type is RandomAccessIterator and whose value type is Point_3.
contains index ranges to form polygons by providing indices into PointRange
a sequence of Named Parameters
an instance of PointRange with 3D points and corresponding 3D normal vectors
a range of non-coplanar polygons defined by a range of indices into points
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the elements of the input range PointRange points.
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3
Write timing and internal information to std::cout.
Use the oriented bounding box instead of the axis-aligned bounding box. While the z direction is maintained, the x axis is aligned with the largest variation in the horizontal plane.
Factor for extension of the bounding box of the input data to be used for the partition.
The maximal depth of the octree for subdividing the kinetic partition before initialization.
A node in the octree is only split if the contained number of primitives is larger and the maximal depth is not yet reached.

briefdescription.para: inserts non-coplanar polygons, requires initialize() afterwards to have effect.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of ConstRange whose iterator type is RandomAccessIterator and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3.
contains index ranges to form polygons by providing indices into PointRange
a sequence of Named Parameters
an instance of PointRange with 3D points
a range of non-coplanar polygons defined by a range of indices into points
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: a property map associating points to the elements of the points
Type: a model of ReadablePropertyMap whose key type is the value type of the iterator of PointRange and whose value type is GeomTraits::Point_3

briefdescription.para: initializes the kinetic partition of the bounding box.

parameterdescription.para: a sequence of Named Parameters
a sequence of Named Parameters among the ones listed below

listitem.para: Use the oriented bounding box instead of the axis-aligned bounding box. While the z direction is maintained, the x axis is aligned with the largest variation in the horizontal plane.
Factor for extension of the bounding box of the input data to be used for the partition.
The maximal depth of the octree for subdividing the kinetic partition before initialization.
A node in the octree is only split if the contained number of primitives is larger and the maximal depth is not yet reached.

simplesect.para: input data has been provided via insert().

briefdescription.para: propagates the kinetic polygons in the initialized partition.

parameterdescription.para: maximum number of allowed intersections for each input polygon before its expansion stops.

briefdescription.para: returns the number of volumes created by the kinetic partition.

memberdef.definition: const std::vector< typename Intersection_kernel::Plane_3 > & CGAL::Kinetic_space_partition_3< GeomTraits, IntersectionTraits >::input_planes
memberdef.name: input_planes

briefdescription.para: provides the support planes of the partition derived from the input polygons
exports the kinetic partition into a Linear_cell_complex_for_combinatorial_map<3, 3> using a model of KineticLCCItems as items, e.g., Kinetic_space_partition_3::Linear_cell_complex_min_items.

detaileddescription.para: Volume and face attributes defined in the model KineticLCCItems are filled. The volume index is in the range [0, number of volumes -1]

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of Linear_cell_complex_for_combinatorial_map<3, 3> using a model of KineticLCCItems.
instance of LCC to be filled with the kinetic partition. Any data contained in lcc will be cleared before.

briefdescription.para: identifies the support of a face in the exported linear cell complex, which is either an input polygon, identified by a non-negative number, a side of the bounding box in the rotated coordinate system or a face of the octree used to partition the scene.

briefdescription.para: creates the kinetic partition of the bounding box of the polygons given as input data.

detaileddescription.para: The kinetic partition can either be initialized by using the default constructor Kinetic_space_partition_3(), insert() to provide input data and initialize() to prepare the partition or by using the constructor with input parameters.

parameterdescription.para: must be a model of KineticSpacePartitionTraits_3.
must be a model of Kernel using exact computations. Defaults to CGAL::Exact_predicates_exact_constructions_kernel.
